verses.roman:
brahmacārī bale,--"tumi karilā saṁśaya
eka-manā hañā śuna tāhāra niścaya

synonyms: brahmacārī bale—Nakula Brahmacārī said; tumi—you; karilā saṁśaya—have doubted; eka-manā hañā—with great attention; śuna—please hear; tāhāra—for that; niścaya—settlement.
translation: Nakula Brahmacārī said, "I know that you are doubtful. Now please hear this evidence with great attention.
